actions.prompt: Analyze this Minecraft terrain map. Is each pixel representing a single block? Look for terrain detail resolution - can you see individual block-level terrain features, contour lines, and smooth height gradients? Compare the detail level to what you'd expect from a 1:1 block resolution Minecraft map.
At 3x zoom, analyze the terrain detail. Can you see individual block-level pixels? Are the height shading and contour lines smooth and detailed? This should show full Minecraft block resolution.
